item.description:
One of the Boston Happy Hour Group's members, Marie, will be promoting Corona Light nights at area bars this summer and we decided to have the next couple of Happy Hour meetups coincide with the Corona Light nights. Of course you can still get any beverage of your choice.

The next one will be held at Clerys.

Clerys
113 Dartmouth Street, Boston, MA 02116
Phone: (617) 262-9874


Located a block from Copley Plaza at the corner of Dartmouth and Columbus, this bistro and bar earned the title of the 2002 Best of Boston: Best Neighborhood bar, serving more than 400 regulars Enjoy one of the 16 draught beers either at the bar, by the bistro windows or by the fireplace in a cozy booth when the fickle weather of New England turns cold. It's the perfect place to meet friends and enjoy a comfortable atmosphere with fast & friendly bartenders. On select nights partake in some karaoke or dance the night away with DJ Rhythm Nights. Located downstairs is the perfect nook for your company functions. This private and roomy space features a full bar and dance floor.

See you there!
item.name: Corona Light Nights Part II-Wednesday, August 1st
